document_data.name: Gorath
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gorath''' was the hidden leader of the [[Royal Vagabonds]] of [[Shou Lung]] around [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Gorath secretly assisted [[the Old Man]] in managing the activities of the Royal Vagabonds against enemies of Shou Lung. In truth, Gorath was for centuries in the service of the [[Chin dynasty]], a task assigned to him by the [[Undersecretary of the Minister of War]] in the [[Celestial Bureaucracy]] and he did not always work for the good of the Empire.
document_data.Relations:
The Gorath had encountered [[Lui-hsia Chih]] of the [[Many-Hued Peacock Society]] several times in the past and they were mortal enemies.

Sometimes he appeared to direct the Royal Vagabonds cell in [[Nakamaru]] in [[Wa]], where he correctly presumed that Lui-hsia Chih was hidden.
